nodes.text: The Model 38 sharpshooter's rifle was one of Czerka Arms' best-selling firearms of the slugthrower product line, and each were laser measured to accommodate the wielders' natural stance and included a custom-fitted stock, trigger, and optic for optimal shooting comfort. Most often sold to hunters and marksmen, the Model 38 had an incredible accuracy and felt as it they were an extension of the shooter's body.

The Model 38 fired slugs that were made from proprietary alloys that ensured accurate flight and high-energy, armor-splitting impact. They were ideal for hunting some of the most dangerous creatures such as acklays, gundarks, and reeks. Some law enforcement agencies were often known to use the Model 38 due to its easily penetration of light cover and armor criminals would tend to use.
